title: Sam Frost shows off maternal side as she beams with baby during Home and Away filming
text:
She's the former Bachelorette babe who has become a fan favourite on Home and Away.

And Sam Frost certainly looked in high spirits as she filmed for the soap this week - as she was seen showing off her maternal side in Palm Beach, Sydney.

The 30-year-old was filming scenes with a baby alongside her hunky co-star Tim Franklin, who plays Summer Bay cop Colby Thorne.

She's a natural! Sam Frost (right) was spotted in high spirits as she filmed for upcoming Home and Away scenes. Pictured with co-star Tim Franklin (right)

She appeared to be in fits of hysterics as she sat with the little one, before trying her hardest to entertain the young tot with hand gestures.

Her character's estranged husband Ryan 'Robbo' Shaw (Jake Ryan) was nowhere to be seen.

For the occasion, Sam rocked a casual chic look by sporting a pair of white denim shorts with rugged fringe detail around the hem.

So sweet! Former Bachelorette star Sam tried her hardest to entertain the little one in heartwarming images

She teamed her look with a casual jumper, and embraced her natural beauty with just a hint of make-up to emphasise her striking features.

In other scenes, Sam's hunky co-star James Stewart was spotted flaunting his enviable abs as he filmed for the Channel Seven show.

The Justin Morgan actor went for a shirtless wander down the beach, walking with a surfboard under his arm as he basked in the spring sunshine.

Feeling broody? Sam Frost held on to her heart as she looked on at the little one, as she filmed scenes for the Channel Seven soap set to air later this year

Bringing the heat! James Stewart (pictured) was spotted wearing nothing but a pair of floral swim shorts as he sauntered up the beach in Sydney's Palm Beach

Baby love! Sam looked at ease during filming, as she walked the little tot beside the sea

The storyline for the soap remains under wraps, and is set to air later this year.

Sam previously spoke out about how blessed she feels to be a part of the Home and Away family.

Speaking to TV Week, she said: 'I never in a million years could have imagined my career going the way that it has.'

'To be a respected member of the cast has been amazing, and quite surreal.

'I grew up watching these incredible careers as a child, so I certainly do pinch myself every single day.'
description: Sam Frost certainly looked in high spirits as she filmed for Home and Away this week - as she was spotted showing off her maternal side with a baby on set in Palm Beach, Sydney.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
